## LinkedList.pushFront() method

Adds an element first in the list.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pushFront(element: T): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | T | The element to push to the linked list. |

this
